easy.q: I have a hat but no head. I wear a coat but I have no body. What am I?
easy.hint: Think of what covers a tree.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be.
medium.hint: Consider how adding letters changes the meaning.

hard.q: A box contains four switches. Each switch is either on or off. Exactly two are on. How many different on/off patterns are possible if you require that the two-on switches are never adjacent?
hard.hint: Think about positions in a line of four and which pairs are non-adjacent.
